column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////To end this rather depressing review: maybe I'll be back? Maybe I won't. I can't really say. Probably not
column3: because midtown is not "in the neighborhood" for us. Tiger Den is much closer
column4: and has a lovely Garlic Black Bean Ramen. Heck
column5: Samurai is more convenient and just as new
column6: but they've captured my attention more than JINYA has so you can probably catch us there.
